GaugeText.GaugeString: Order plane captain to connect and apply\n starter air and apply external power.
Landing gear indicator and transition light\n Check.
MASTER TEST switch - Set to LTS\nCheck that all lights illuminate.
MASTER TEST switch - Set to FIRE DET/EXT\nCheck L and R FIRE and GO lights.
MASTER TEST switch - Set to INST\nCheck Fuel,Eng,AoA,Wing Sweep instruments.
ACM panel - Set:Gun rate and rounds,SW COOL - OFF,\nMSL PREP - OFF,MSL MODE - NORM.
EMERG STORES JETT pushbutton light - Out.
Check AIR SOURCE switch is set to OFF.
Set HYD TRANSFER PUMP switch to OFF(Guard up).
EMERG FLT HYD switch to LOW\nCheck for ON flag in EMER FLT LOW window.
EMERG FLT HYD switch to HIGH\nCheck for ON flag in EMER FLT HI window.
EMERG FLT HYD switch to AUTO(LOW)\nCheck for OFF flags in EMER FLT LOW and HI.
ENG CRANK switch to R (Right engine).
Right throttle to IDLE at 20% RPM.
Check R GEN and R FUEL PRESS caution lights\n turn off.
Wait for RPM to reach stable idle\nthen check engine instruments readings.
Order plane captain to disconnect external\n electrical power.
ENG CRANK switch to L (Left engine).
HYD TRANSFER PUMP switch to NORMAL.\nCheck pressurization of COMB HYD PRESS.
Set HYD TRANSFER PUMP switch to OFF(Guard up).
Left throttle to IDLE at 20% RPM.
Check L GEN and L FUEL PRESS caution lights\n turn off.
Wait for RPM to reach stable idle\nthen check engine instruments readings.
Cycle AIR SOURCE switch to L ENG, R ENG,\nthen set it to BOTH ENG.
HYD TRANSFER PUMP switch to NORMAL.
MASTER TEST switch - EMERG GEN.\nNO GO illuminates 1 sec before GO illuminates.
MASTER TEST switch - OFF\nCheck AFCS lights illuminate for 2 seconds.
AFTC - Check. SET R ENG MODE SELECT\n switch to SEC and check lights.
AFTC - Check. SET R ENG MODE SELECT\n switch to SEC and check R ENG SEC light.
AFTC - Check. SET L ENG MODE SELECT\n switch to SEC and check L ENG SEC light.
UHF (COM1) function selector - TR+G or BOTH.
MASTER TEST switch - Set to OBC.\nCoordinate with RIO and plane captain.
Speed brake switch - EXT partially, then RET,\nthen EXT FULLY.
MASTER TEST switch - Set to OFF.\n
Emergency WING SWEEP handle - 20.\nStow handle and guard.
External lights - Check.\nSet according to situation.
ANTI SKID SPOILER BK. switch - SPOILER BK.
MASTER TEST switch - set to STICK SW.
ANTI SKID SPOILER BK switch - OFF.
WING SWEEP MODE switch - MANUAL 50 degrees.
Emergency WING SWEEP handle - OV SW.
ANTI SKID SPOILER BK switch - BOTH.
ANTI SKID - BIT (release parking brake)\nto initiate the test.
ANTI SKID SPOILER BK switch - OFF.
Compass - Check.\nCheck IMU heading on HUD, VDI, HSD and BDHI.
RIO:Waiting for pilot to arm the ejection seat!
RIO:Waiting for pilot to arm the ejection seat!
RIO:Waiting for pilot to close the canopy!
RIO:Waiting for pilot to complete EMER GEN check...
